description: Light, comfortable t-shirt in a soft merino wool/polyester blend. Abisko Wool Logo SS M combines the thermo-regulating property of wool with the durability and quick-drying properties of polyester. It offers a great first layer in both warm and cold conditions and is especially useful on multi- day hikes as wool naturally resists bad odors. Small Fjällräven logo printed on the front.
name: Fjallraven Abisko Wool Logo SS T-Shirt - Mens
